title: Aaron Sorkin addresses controversy about “Steve Jobs” film on Conan
text:
Aaron Sorkin addresses controversy about “Steve Jobs” film on Conan 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Yesterday 
Attempting to make nice with Apple and CEO Tim Cook prior to the public release of a new film about Steve Jobs, Aaron Sorkin has been making...
